snippet: This week's cover photograph by Joël van Houdt shows a number of the people who appear in Luke Mogelson's story at Outpost Shrine, Kajaki, Helmand Province.
abstract: This week's cover photograph by Joël van Houdt shows a number of the people who appear in Luke Mogelson's story at Outpost Shrine, Kajaki, Helmand Province.
lead_paragraph: This week's cover photograph by Joël van Houdt shows a number of the people who appear in Luke Mogelson's article at Outpost Shrine, Kajaki, Helmand Province. This includes soldiers from the Second Squad, First Platoon, Battery G, Second Battalion, 11th Marine Regiment, First Marine Division and comrades from the Afghan National Army.

headline.main: The Key to the Soldiers on the Cover
